header.title: I'm George, a Trainee Front-End Developer
header.description: Hey there! I'm currently working on my full-fledged portfolio, but while it's still baking in the oven, I've put together this temporary one. I decided to revamp it because the old version just wasn't up to par. Below, you'll find some of my projects and contact information. Thanks very much for your attention!

footer.contact_text: I would love to hear about your project and how I could help. Please fill in the form, and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
